挑戦的: (ちょうせんてき) - challenging; defiant; provocative; aggressive
挑撥: (ちょうはつ) - provocation; stirring up; arousal
挑発的: (ちょうはつてき) - provocative; suggestive; lascivious
挘る: (むしる) - to pluck; to pick; to tear
挙がる: (あがる) - (ant: 下がる・1) to rise/to go up/to come up/to ascend/to be raised; to enter (esp. from outdoors)/to come in/to go in; to enter (a school)/to advance to the next grade; to get out (of water)/to come ashore; (also written as 騰る in ref. to price) to increase; to improve/to make progress; to be promoted/to advance; to be made (of profit, etc.); to occur (esp. of a favourable result); (often as 〜で上がる) to be adequate (to cover expenses, etc.); to be finished/to be done/to be over; (of rain) to stop/to lift; to stop (working properly)/to cut out/to give out/to die; to win (in a card game, etc.); (挙がる only) to be arrested; (挙がる only) to turn up (of evidence, etc.); (揚がる only) to be deep fried; to be spoken loudly; to get stage fright; to be offered (to the gods, etc.); to go/to visit; to eat/to drink; (esp. 挙がる) to be listed (as a candidate); to serve (in one's master's home); (in Kyoto) to go north; (after the -masu stem of a verb)  indicates completion
挙げられる: (あげられる) - to be arrested; to be caught; to be captured (e.g. data)
挙げる: (あげる) - to raise/to elevate; to do up (one's hair); to fly (a kite, etc.)/to launch (fireworks, etc.)/to surface (a submarine, etc.); to land (a boat); (揚げる only) to deep-fry; to show someone (into a room); (揚げる only)  to summon (for geishas, etc.); to send someone (away); to enrol (one's child in school)/to enroll; to increase (price, quality, status, etc.)/to develop (talent, skill)/to improve; to make (a loud sound)/to raise (one's voice); to earn (something desirable); to praise; (usu. 挙げる) to give (an example, etc.)/to cite; (usu. 挙げる) to summon up (all of one's energy, etc.); (挙げる only) to arrest; (挙げる only) to nominate; to give; to offer up (incense, a prayer, etc.) to the gods (or Buddha, etc.); to bear (a child); (usu. 挙げる) to conduct (a ceremony, esp. a wedding); (of the tide) to come in; to vomit; (after the -te form of a verb) to do for (the sake of someone else); (after the -masu stem of a verb)  to complete ...; (after the -masu stem of a humble verb to increase the level of humility)  to humbly do ...
挙げ句: (あげく) - (esp. 〜したあげく) in the end (after a long process)/finally/after all/at last; last line (of a renga)
挙げ句の果て: (あげくのはて) - finally; in the end; on top of all that
挙げ足: (あげあし) - finding fault; (上げ足, 上足 only) (ant: 下げ足) upturn (in the market)
挙げ足をとる: (あげあしをとる) - to find fault with someone; to flame someone; to trip up somebody
挙げ足を取る: (あげあしをとる) - to find fault with someone; to flame someone; to trip up somebody
挙って: (こぞって) - all; all together; unanimously
挙る: (こぞる) - to assemble everything together; to do something as a group
挙動不審: (きょどうふしん) - (yoji) suspicious behavior; acting suspiciously
挙句: (ageku) - no fim; finalmente; afinal; última linha (de um renga)
挙句の果て: (あげくのはて) - finally; in the end; on top of all that
挙尾虫: (シリアゲムシ) - scorpionfly (esp. the Japanese scorpionfly, Panorpa japonica); scorpion fly
挙手: (きょしゅ) - raising (holding up) one's hand; salute
挙措言動: (きょそげんどう) - (yoji) speech and behavior; words and deeds
挙措進退: (きょそしんたい) - (yoji) behavior; bearing; demeanor
挙行: (きょこう) - celebration (of ceremony); solemnization (e.g. of a marriage); solemnisation
挙証責任: (きょしょうせきにん) - {law} burden of proof
挙足: (あげあし) - finding fault; (上げ足, 上足 only) (ant: 下げ足) upturn (in the market)
挟まる: (はさまる) - to get between; to be caught in
挟み上げる: (はさみあげる) - to pick up (with chopsticks); to take
挟み切る: (はさみきる) - to nip off; to snip; to clip; to trim off
挟み将棋: (はさみしょうぎ) - piece-capturing board game
挟み打ち: (はさみうち) - pincer attack; attack on both sides (flanks)
挟み撃ち: (はさみうち) - pincer attack; attack on both sides (flanks)
挟み焼き: (はさみやき) - grilled slices of lotus root, eggplant, etc. with a filling (usu. minced meat)
挟み込む: (hasamikomu) - to insert, to put between, to tuck (ex. tecido em uma fenda)
挟む: (hasamu) - to hold between (ex.: os próprios dedos, hashis), to grip (from both sides); to put between, to sandwich between, to insert, to interpose , to hold between (e.g. one's fingers, chopsticks), to grip (from both sides); to put between, to sandwich between, to insert, to interpose; to catch (e.g. a finger in a door), to trap, to pinch; to insert (e.g. a break into proceedings), to interpose (e.g. an objection), to interject, to throw in (e.g. a joke)
挟侍: (きょうじ) - flanking attendant to the main deity of veneration in a temple
挟撃: (きょうげき) - pincer movement; pincer attack
挟撃作戦: (きょうげきさくせん) - (yoji) pincer operation (tactic)
挨拶: (aisatsu) - cumprimento, saudações, saudação, saudação, frase educada usada ao encontrar ou se despedir de alguém; frase educada usada para expressar desculpas, simpatia, parabéns, etc.; discurso (de congratulação ou apreciação), discurso; resposta
挨拶は抜きで: (あいさつはぬきで) - without compliments (greetings)
挨拶まわり: (あいさつまわり) - courtesy call; making the rounds
挨拶を交わす: (あいさつをかわす) - to exchange greetings
挨拶回り: (あいさつまわり) - courtesy call; making the rounds
挨拶文: (あいさつぶん) - greeting phrase (in letter, etc.); salutation
挨拶語: (あいさつご) - greeting words; words of greeting
挫く: (くじく) - to sprain/to twist; to dampen (enthusiasm)/to discourage/to dishearten/to dispirit/to depress/to unnerve/to crush
挫ける: (くじける) - to be disheartened/to lose heart/to be dispirited/to be crushed (emotionally); to be sprained; to be snapped/to be broken
挫折: (zasetsu) - setback, failure (por exemplo, planos, negócios), frustration, discouragement
挫折感: (ざせつかん) - feeling of frustration; sense of failure
挫滅症候群: (ざめつしょうこうぐん) - crush syndrome
挫骨: (ざこつ) - spraining of a bone joint
振う: (ふるう) - to swing/to wield (physically)/to exert; to exercise (e.g. power, ability)/to exhibit/to display/to wield (metaphorically); to flourish/to prosper/to thrive
振られる: (フラれる) - to be given the cold shoulder; to be jilted; to be rejected; to be dumped
振り: (furi) - balançar, sacudir, acenar, balançando; aparência, comportamento, balançar, sacudir, acenar, balançando; aparência, comportamento; fingimento, exibição, fingir; ir a restaurante, hotel etc. sem reserva ou apresentação
振りかえる: (ふりかえる) - to turn head/to look over one's shoulder/to turn around/to look back; to think back (on)/to reminisce/to look back (on)/to reflect (on)
振りかける: (ふりかける) - to sprinkle over (e.g. salt, pepper, etc. on food)
振りかざす: (ふりかざす) - to raise (esp. overhead)/to brandish (e.g. sword)/to flourish; to wield (e.g. power, authority)/to proclaim one's principles
振りかぶる: (ふりかぶる) - to hold aloft (e.g. a sword); to brandish
振りがな: (ふりがな) - furigana (kana over or beside kanji to indicate pronunciation)
振りしぼる: (ふりしぼる) - to muster (one's strength); to strain (e.g. one's voice)
振りっ子: (ブリッコ) - woman or girl who acts cute by playing innocent and helpless
振りまく: (ふりまく) - to scatter; to sprinkle; to lavish
振りまわす: (ふりまわす) - to wield/to brandish/to flourish/to wave (about)/to swing; to display (one's knowledge)/to show off; to abuse (one's power); to manipulate someone
振り付け: (ふりつけ) - choreography; dance composition; dance coaching
振り仮名: (ふりがな) - furigana (kana over or beside kanji to indicate pronunciation)
振り出: (ふりだし) - starting point/beginning/outset; drawing/issuing/draft/draught; shaking out; throw (of dice)/toss; infusion
振り出し: (ふりだし) - starting point/beginning/outset; drawing/issuing/draft/draught; shaking out; throw (of dice)/toss; infusion
